title: Storage Quota
description: Representation of hard and soft quota on content storage

xdm:enforcement.name: Enforcement Type
xdm:enforcement.decription: Determines whether the quota is being enforced (hard quota) or only reported on (soft quota)

xdm:amount.name: Quota amount
xdm:amount.decription: The quota against which consumption is measured at the point of the repository that links to this document.

xdm:consumed.name: Currently consumed amount
xdm:consumed.decription: The amount currently consumed against the quota at the point of the repository that links to this document.

xdm:unit.name: Unit of the 'limit' and 'consumed' properties
xdm:unit.decription: The unit that is used to determine the quota and measure consumption. This property is optional, but fixed, i.e. it allows consumers to quickly understand the value just by looking at the JSON response from the API.
